davinci.interaction

Class ActionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • davinci.interaction.ActionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction, java.util.EventListener

    public class ActionAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAction
    Default implementation of IAction interface. This is a empty interaction does
    nothing. Users can overwrite its methods when necessary.
    Author:
    Nan Cao
    See Also:
    IAction
